TopicTitle: Stable Flight Sea Plane. The KALGRIFFIN!

Articles.Content:
Hello all as my first post on here I'd like to share my first attempt at a sea plane.

Pros:

Capable of Horizontal take off and landing over land and sea

Stable Flight

Has a working cargo bay to bomb the crap out of those kerbals across the street who told you that you'd never work for Kasa

Pretty Bad Ass

Cons:

Low Fuel.

Download Link:

http://www./download/x5h8omu1h7om8bw/Kalgriffin.craft

Any input, critiques, or suggestions would be welcome.
Beautiful, and functional! More than I could ever accomplish! Dang, you good.
WOW Amazing congratulation's on a job well done indeed
Thanks a ton guys, I'll be sure to continue posting my crafts
Very cool, I suggest adding radial air intakes to your floats though, for some reason they provide stupid amounts of buoyancy and so you will travel a lot faster on water
I know that but unfortunately the Radial Intakes look pretty ugly when used that way.

I know that but unfortunately the Radial Intakes look pretty ugly when used that way.

have you to tried a mod called Tweekeverything to reduce the size of the intakes so they don't look as bad if thats the reason?

Yea I've used tweekscale and do enjoy that mod but If I did that it wouldn't be a stock craft anymore. Trust me when I say I love using mods but it's a lot easier to share your craft when theres no mods necessary to use it. My personal favorite mod is BDArmory.

It's called Tweakscale.

There is is a mod called Tweakeverything, however it was Tweakscale as you have said that I meant to say, I have tried both and i much prefer tweakscale although really they both do the same thing.
